sukhwinder.chat
Class ChatRoomList

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--sukhwinder.chat.ChatRoomList
public class ChatRoomList
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to manipulate and store ChatRoom objects. It provides methods to store and retrieve ChatRoom objects in this ChatRoomList.

Author:
Sukhwinder Singh(ssruprai@hotmail.com)
